page.title: 05LAW AND ORDER
page.content: Our area has two policemen permanently allocated to it.One lives in Forest Row.The C.I.D. at East Grinstead covers the area.Community policing has been introduced and it has been a success.One officer works on the Herontyre Estate though 5 officers work in our block.From Jan. to March 1985 5 house burglaries were committed,8 other burglaries,5 cases of vandalism, 1 assault, 1 misuse of drugs, and 1 misuse of a forged bank note.So far,50% have been solved,10% up on last year.The large rural houses attract many burglars though poaching is not a problem.
